nodes.text: Ruus was a male Human Jedi Master serving the Jedi Order and the Galactic Republic as an instructor during the Cold War with the resurgent Sith Empire. Fair-skinned with blue eyes and brown hair as well as a beard and mustache, Ruus carried a single lightsaber and wore shoulder armor over his tan and yellow robes. He was stationed on the Republic capital planet of Coruscant, where he and the Jedi Knight Tephan maintained a base in the Senate Commercial District's eastern wing.

Master Ruus first appeared as a Jedi Knight trainer in the BioWare–LucasArts video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, and he is also mentioned in the Star Wars: The Old Republic Explorer's Guide, which was released alongside the game in 2011.
